segments.text: I notice the water just pouring out of the sink like no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, and she’s completely ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second now, and it’s going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to notice before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s only a matter of time before someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the mom is going to be so upset when she finally sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching something that’s about to go very wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
